8: As One Of The Oldest Of The Brothers Still Alive In This Fraternity Of Professional Wrestlers, After A Weekend Of Signing Autographs & Meeting People, I Was Reminded Of So Many Respectful People Fiterman Sports Group. After Losing My Good Friend Kevin Sullivan, It Reminded Me To Make Sure To Tell Everyone That’s Important In Your Life That You Love Them Because Tomorrow Isn’t Promised As We Find Out Every Day Of Our Lives. I Have 12 Appearances Between Now And December, And I’m Going To Live Every Day To The Fullest & Stay Closer To My Family & Friends Than Ever Before Because Nothing Is Guaranteed. I Would Suggest That Everyone Apply That To Their Personal Lives As Well.
